QuestData.Title: Farmer Fung's Vote I: Yak Attack
QuestData.Description: The next voting member on the Tiller's council is Farmer Fung, and it's easy to see why.$B$BThat man's vegetables are the biggest in the valley! I only hope that someday I can grow pumpkins as big as his.$B$BIf we hope to join the Tillers, he would be the next person to convince.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Farmer Fung at The Heartland or the Halfhill Market in the Valley of the Four Winds.
